plugin.name: ziggeo-video-for-ninja-forms
plugin.title: Ziggeo Video for Ninja Forms
plugin.author: Ziggeo
plugin.tags: ziggeo, video, video field, form builder, video form, Ninja Forms
plugin.description: This plugin brings video player and recorder (including screen recording) to your Ninja Forms. It helps you make it easy to add fields that utilize award winning Ziggeo to your forms.
plugin.highlight: Minor fixes and using new addon methods
